General.Name: HPI AG
General.Description: HPI AG provides industrial procurement services in Europe. The company operates through Production Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Chemical & Pharmaceutical Raw Materials, Industrial Commodities and Consumables, and Electrical Engineering/Electronics segments. It offers short-term inventory management, warehousing, and logistics services. The company also provides electronic components, chemicals, pharmaceutical raw materials, and mechanical and electronic products to businesses. In addition, it offers customized services for IT and electronics comprising intelligent cabling systems, network and security solutions, server and storage systems, and Internet-based services, such as energy management, as well as cloud computing. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Munich, Germany.
